St._Paul.Como Regional Park Pool:
Como Regional Park Pool or just Como Pool is a public swimming pool located in the Como Park neighborhood of Saint Paul, Minnesota.


== Old pool and site ==
Como Pool was built on the former site of the Saint Paul Workhouse which was located in Como Park until 1960. The old pool was built in 1962 for $162,000 by a private operator, Public Pools Inc., which leased the land from the city.
